Paper.Title: Ef cient Parsing of Highly Ambiguous Context-Free Grammars with Bit Vectors

Section.Paragraph: An ef cient bit-vector-based CKY-style parser for context-free parsing is presented. The parser computes a compact parse forest representation of the complete set of possible analyses for large treebank grammars and long input sentences. The parser uses bit-vector operations to parallelise the basic parsing operations. The parser is particularly useful when all analyses are needed rather than just the most probable one.
